name: Sight Reading Bass
description:
Become an expert in sight reading.

This application helps you learn how to read sheet music bass notes. Simply play it for five minutes a day and in less than a week you'll be able to recognize any note in the bass clef that you see.

The game starts at level one with three notes only. If you score more than 15 correct answers you'll move up to the next level and will be challenged with additional tones.

If you score less than 5 correct notes you'll be moved one level lower, so that you can concentrate on a simpler set of notes and therefore improve your accuracy.

For extra fun challenge your friends to beat your score.

Enjoy becoming a musical prodigy.




Visit WWW.BIDBOX.COM for more great apps
